app.title: BrandingBro

app.keywords: video, production, audiovisual, portfolio, cinema, editing

hero.project1_subtitle: Capturing unforgettable moments under the stars.
hero.project2_subtitle: The process behind a successful campaign.
hero.subtitle: We create audiovisual experiences that tell stories, inspire emotions, and build brands.
hero.whatsapp_message: Hello! I'm interested in your audiovisual production services.

videos.video1_description: Beautiful beach wedding with elegant decoration and emotional moments
videos.video2_description: Launch announcement for an innovative tech product
videos.video3_description: Exploration of natural ecosystems and animal life in their habitat

videoGallery.noVideosFound: No videos found in this category.

services.videography_description: We capture your vision with 4K/8K filming using state-of-the-art equipment to achieve the perfect visual aesthetic.
services.editing_description: We edit with precision to give rhythm, coherence, and emotion to your story. Professional color grading included.
services.motion_graphics_description: Graphic elements and animations that enhance your message and give a unique identity to your videos.
services.audio_production_description: Voice recording, music selection, and professional sound mixing to complement the visuals.
services.creative_direction_description: Development of concepts, scripts, and on-set direction to ensure your vision comes to life.
services.digital_content_description: Strategy and production of content optimized for social media and digital platforms.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Testimonials from clients who have trusted us with their audiovisual projects.
testimonials.testimonial1_text: The level of quality and professionalism in each project is exceptional. They have exceeded our expectations in every campaign we have worked on together.
testimonials.testimonial2_text: The ability to transform our vision into a compelling visual narrative has been key to the success of our collaborative projects.
testimonials.testimonial3_text: Working with this team has been a transformative experience. Their attention to detail and commitment to excellence set them apart in the industry.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.paragraph1: We are a team of audiovisual creators passionate about telling stories that connect. Founded in 2014, we have produced content for national and international brands, always with a cinematic and narrative approach.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Our mission is to turn your vision into a stunning visual experience that resonates with your audience. Whether it's a commercial, documentary, or social media content, we bring the same passion and quality to every project.
features: More than 10 years of experience in audiovisual production
Use of 8K technology and latest generation drones
Advanced post-production with professional color grading
Record time deliveries without sacrificing quality

contact.sectionSubtitle: Have a project in mind? We'd love to hear your ideas and bring them to life. Fill out the form or contact us directly via WhatsApp or our social media channels.
contact.formSuccessMessage: Your message has been sent successfully. We will get in touch with you shortly.
contact.formErrorMessage: There was an error sending your message. Please try again or contact us directly.

formValidation.name_minLength: Name must be at least 2 characters long
formValidation.message_minLength: Message must be at least 10 characters long

ideaModal.title: AI Idea Generator
ideaModal.subtitle: Describe your business or project to get content ideas.
ideaModal.placeholder: e.g., A coffee shop that also sells books
ideaModal.errorMessage: Sorry, we couldn't generate ideas at the moment.

projects.title: TechFlow
projects.subtitle: Digital Innovation Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive brand identity for a cutting-edge technology startup focused on digital transformation.
projects.challenge: TechFlow needed to establish credibility in a crowded tech market while conveying innovation and reliability.
projects.solution: We created a modern, geometric logo with dynamic typography and a sophisticated color palette that reflects both innovation and trustworthiness.

projects.title: Eco Essence
projects.subtitle: Sustainable Beauty Brand
projects.description: Sustainable packaging design for an eco-friendly beauty brand committed to environmental responsibility.
projects.challenge: Create premium packaging that reflects luxury while maintaining eco-friendly principles and cost-effectiveness.
projects.solution: Developed minimalist packaging using recycled materials with elegant typography and earthy color schemes.

projects.title: Urban Eats
projects.subtitle: Food Delivery Platform
projects.description: Complete digital brand experience for a revolutionary food delivery platform connecting local restaurants.
projects.challenge: Stand out in the competitive food delivery market while supporting local businesses and community connection.
projects.solution: Created a vibrant, community-focused brand with intuitive app design and local-first messaging strategy.

projects.title: Artisan Coffee Co.
projects.subtitle: Craft Coffee Roasters
projects.description: Authentic brand identity for artisan coffee roasters celebrating traditional craftsmanship and quality.
projects.challenge: Differentiate from mass-market coffee brands while honoring traditional roasting heritage.
projects.solution: Developed a handcrafted visual identity with custom typography and authentic storytelling approach.

projects.title: MindSpace
projects.subtitle: Mental Wellness Platform
projects.description: Calming digital experience design for a mental wellness platform focused on accessibility and empathy.
projects.challenge: Create a safe, welcoming digital space that reduces anxiety while providing effective wellness tools.
projects.solution: Designed with soft colors, intuitive navigation, and mindful user interactions prioritizing mental comfort.

projects.title: Solar Dynamics
projects.subtitle: Renewable Energy Solutions
projects.description: Progressive brand identity for renewable energy company leading the transition to sustainable power.
projects.challenge: Communicate innovation and reliability in the rapidly evolving renewable energy sector.
projects.solution: Created a dynamic visual system representing energy flow with bold, forward-thinking design elements.
